name: floridian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Florida: Rodriguez became the first Floridian to compete for the USA at a Winter Olympics. Floridans oppose any development that might bring risk of an oil slick.
More examplesFewer examplesFor a Floridian to leave for a hurricane, you know it's going to be bad.There are 10.9 million Floridians who have driver's licenses.Although many Floridians know about the drought, tourists may be ignorant.

belonging or relating to the US state of Florida or its people: I was having dinner with my Floridian friends Barry and Andy. The inn has a really nice Floridian charm.
More examplesFewer examplesA lot of my Floridian friends are saying the same thing. There is much more to this Floridian city than a giant mouse and his theme-park rides.The Floridan Aquifer is the underground river that supplies drinking water for most of North Florida.
